title: Ricardo Xavier
text:
Ricardo Gomes Xavier (born July 22, 1978 in <a href="Bonito%2C%20Mato%20Grosso%20do%20Sul">Bonito, Mato Grosso do Sul</a>) is a Brazilian <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>.
Career.
Played for <a href="Clube%20N%C3%A1utico%20Capibaribe">Náutico</a>.
